Summary: Bright red looked like it was on fire
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the baseball field with at least a hundred people when I heard someone said "check that over there looks like a UFO." We all looked at it and couldn't explain it. To me it looked like a square and was red or orange maybe both but it look like fire to me. It was not moving all that fast I would like to say the speed of an airplane in the night sky. I will also say the night was very clear and you can see every star in the sky. I am not the only one who saw it there were many. I just felt like I should report this because it is to real to ignore...
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Sebastian
There were no other sightings in Sebastian on or around April 16th 2013
